title: Structured Design of Online Mathematics Learning Management Systems Through Systematic Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Flexible Learning Environment via Customized Mobile Content, Emphasizing Short-Intensive Courses for Learner Motivation and Real-Life Applicability

learning_goals: Learners can explain standardized operational procedures for an online math learning management system
Learners achieve an 80% or higher completion rate in a mobile microlearning environment
Through team-based project execution, learners propose at least three improvements for online learning structures
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
